tool_description: Analyzes email conversation threads to extract context, identify key points, track decisions, and summarize the conversation flow for informed responses.

thread_emails.description: Array of email contents in chronological order

thread_participants.description: List of email addresses or names of thread participants

analysis_focus.description: Focus area: decisions, action_items, timeline, sentiment, issues

thread_start_date.description: Start date of the email thread

error_messages: Empty thread emails: Provide at least one email in the thread
Thread too long: Maximum 20 emails supported for analysis
Insufficient participants: At least 2 participants required for thread analysis
Too many participants: Maximum 15 participants supported
Invalid analysis focus: Use one of [decisions, action_items, timeline, sentiment, issues]
Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format for thread_start_date
usage: Provide thread_emails array and thread_participants list, optionally specify analysis_focus and thread_start_date. The tool returns comprehensive thread analysis with key insights.

thread_summary.description: Concise summary of the entire email thread

key_decisions.description: Major decisions made during the conversation

unresolved_issues.description: Issues that remain unresolved in the thread

participant_roles.description: Role each participant plays in the conversation

next_steps.description: Recommended next steps based on thread analysis
